title: Deep Learning
description: Comprehensive textbook covering the foundations of deep learning, from basic concepts to advanced architectures. Essential reading for understanding modern neural networks.

title: Attention Is All You Need
description: The groundbreaking paper that introduced the Transformer architecture, revolutionizing NLP and leading to models like GPT and BERT.

title: Fast.ai Practical Deep Learning for Coders
description: Hands-on course that teaches deep learning through practical projects and real-world applications. Great for learning by doing.

title: The Illustrated Transformer
description: Visual guide that breaks down the Transformer architecture with clear diagrams and explanations. Perfect for understanding self-attention mechanisms.

title: Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction
description: Modern textbook covering probabilistic approaches to machine learning, including Bayesian methods and uncertainty quantification.

title: On Calibration of Modern Neural Networks
description: Influential paper on neural network calibration, showing that modern networks are poorly calibrated and proposing temperature scaling as a solution.

title: Stanford CS224N: NLP with Deep Learning
description: Comprehensive course covering neural approaches to NLP, from word embeddings to large language models.

title: Understanding LSTM Networks
description: Classic article explaining how LSTM networks work with intuitive visualizations. A must-read for understanding recurrent architectures.

title: Dummy Repo
description: This is a placeholder entry for testing purposes.
